chapters.title: Chapter 13: Wonderful News
chapters.info: Coiren Saeldain, p. 304 (345)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She is plump and pompous, and led the embassy Elaida sent to Rand in Cairhien. She was captured and shielded during the battle at Dumai's Wells. She was designated to take over that group if something happened to both Galina and Katerine.
